windows.name: assoc
windows.description: Displays or modifies file extension associations.

windows.name: attrib
windows.description: Displays or changes file attributes.

windows.name: break
windows.description: Sets or clears extended CTRL+C checking.

windows.name: bcdedit
windows.description: Sets properties in boot database to control boot loading.

parameters.name: deletevalue
parameters.description: Deletes a boot entry option value.

windows.name: cacls
windows.description: Displays or modifies access control lists (ACLs) of files.

parameters.name: edit
parameters.description: Edit ACL instead of replacing it.

windows.name: cd
windows.description: Displays the name of or changes the current directory.

windows.name: chkdsk
windows.description: Checks a disk and displays a status report.

parameters.name: recover
parameters.description: Locates bad sectors and recovers readable information.

windows.name: cls
windows.description: Clears the screen.

windows.name: cmd
windows.description: Starts a new instance of the Windows command interpreter.

parameters.name: execute
parameters.description: Carries out the command specified by the string and then terminates.

parameters.name: keep
parameters.description: Carries out the command specified by the string and remains.

windows.name: copy
windows.description: Copies one or more files to another location.

windows.name: del
windows.description: Deletes one or more files.

windows.name: dir
windows.description: Displays a list of files and subdirectories in a directory.

parameters.name: bare
parameters.description: Displays a bare list of directories and files.

windows.name: diskpart
windows.description: Displays or configures disk partition properties.

parameters.name: script
parameters.description: Specifies the script file to run.

windows.name: echo
windows.description: Displays messages or turns command echoing on or off.

windows.name: exit
windows.description: Quits the CMD.EXE program (command interpreter).

windows.name: format
windows.description: Formats a disk for use with Windows.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Forces the volume to dismount first if necessary.

windows.name: help
windows.description: Provides Help information for Windows commands.

windows.name: mkdir
windows.description: Creates a directory.

windows.name: move
windows.description: Moves one or more files from one directory to another.

windows.name: ping
windows.description: Tests connectivity to a network host.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of echo requests to send.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait for each reply.

windows.name: rd
windows.description: Removes a directory.

windows.name: ren
windows.description: Renames a file or files.

windows.name: shutdown
windows.description: Shuts down or restarts the computer.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Set timeout before shutdown or restart.

windows.name: tasklist
windows.description: Displays all currently running tasks including services.

windows.name: taskkill
windows.description: Kills or stops a running process or application.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Specifies image name of process to be terminated.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Specifies process ID of process to be terminated.

windows.name: time
windows.description: Displays or sets the system time.

windows.name: tree
windows.description: Graphically displays the directory structure of a drive.

parameters.name: ascii
parameters.description: Uses ASCII instead of extended characters.

parameters.name: directories-only
parameters.description: Displays the names of the files in each folder.

windows.name: type
windows.description: Displays the contents of a text file.

windows.name: xcopy
windows.description: Copies files and directory trees.

parameters.name: subdirectories
parameters.description: Copies directories and subdirectories except empty ones.
